title: Man Booker Prize 2015 (longlist)+Works by 4 Nobel Lit laureates
description:
FICTION

Blue guitar, The - John Banville
Brief History of Seven Killings, A - Marlon James
Chimes, The - Anna Smaill
Did You Ever Have a Family - Bill Clegg
Fishermen, The - Chigozie Obioma
Green Road, The - Anne Enright
Illuminations, The - Andrew O'Hagan
Lila - Marilynne Robinson
Little life, A - Hanya Yanagihara
Moor's Account, The - Laila Lalami
Pedigree - Patrick Modiano
Satin Island - Tom McCarthy
School of English, The - Hilary Mantel
Sleeping on Jupiter - Anuradha Roy
So you don't get lost in the neighborhood - Patrick Modiano
Spool of Blue Thread, A - Anne Tyler
Strangeness in my mind - Orhan Pamuk
Submission - Michel Houellebecq
Year of the Runaways, The - Sunjeev Sahota


NON-FICTION

Notes on the death of culture - Mario Vargas Llosa
Voices from Chernobyl: The oral history of a nuclear disaster - Svetlana Alexievich
Zinky Boys: Soviet voices from the Afghanistan war - Svetlana Alexievich


*******************************

Remarks:

1: To help people download some or all of the above titles, I would appreciate it if you could keep the 

torrent alive by seeding it for at least an hour after you have finished. Thanks for your co-operation.

2: Not all of the above titles are available in both EPUB and MOBI formats. To convert from one format to the 

other, you may wish to use a free open-source software such as Calibre.

3: I have added some recent titles by four Nobel Literature Prize laureates (Svetlana Alexievich, Patrick 

Modiano, Orhan Pamuk and Mario Vargas Llosa).

4: "The Blue Guitar" by John Banville and "Submission" by Michel Houellebecq
